attributes.action: Stop MP's blocking the prorogation of Parliament.
attributes.additional_details: MP's have had over 2 years to debate and vote on all matters regarding Brexit and MUST NOT prevent the prorogation of Parliament as a method to further delay or cancel Brexit.   The will of the people as expressed in the 2016 referendum must be fully enacted by 31 October 2019.  A new legislative agenda preparing the UK for the post Brexit era is an essential part of the preparation for a Sovereign United Kingdom.
attributes.background: We the undersigned fully support the Governments approach to proroguing Parliament to allow a new Parliamentary session and new legislation following a Queen’s speech.
